resources.string: Prefer HDMI switches to a selected HDMI input when it is connected automatically some time after your TV turns on. This is helpful for people who don\'t want to use a smart TV to watch horrible
Select the HDMI device that your TV should prefer. Make sure that this device is turned on within the duration set below.
Set the delay after which your TV will automatically switch to the selected HDMI input if it is connected and turned on.

Prefer HDMI automatically switches to a connected HDMI input about a minute after your TV turns on. Make sure that your HDMI input device is turned on within that time. To avoid switching to a HDMI input unintentionally, turn it off.
